output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present in the post, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to Candidate: The post explicitly mentions "George Simion", who is a presidential candidate (Poziția nr. 2 – GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION – Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor).
3. Addresses Wide Population: - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Has a significant reach (80,000-89,999 impressions) - Substantial ad spend (600-699 RON) - Targets a very large audience (1,000,001+ estimated audience)
4. Electoral Objective: - The title "George Simion explică cum se cucerește un popor" (George Simion explains how to conquer a people) appears to be politically motivated - Given the timing (during election period) and the focus on a presidential candidate, this has clear electoral implications
5. Journalism: - This doesn't appear to be journalistic content - The title suggests opinion or political messaging rather than news reporting
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but rather a sponsored, widely distributed political message
The timing of this post (November 22, 2024) and its continued running during the presidential election period, after the campaign period has ended, is particularly problematic.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly features a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement with wide reach - Occurs after the campaign period ended - Has clear political messaging - Not journalistic in nature - Substantial resources invested in distribution
conclusion.message-for-police: 4media.INFO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui material de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale, respectiv postarea cu ID-ul 902982898467615 pe facebook, care promovează candidatul George Simion. Materialul este o reclamă plătită, cu un buget substanțial (600-699 RON), care a generat între 80,000 și 89,999 de afișări, fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea are caracter electoral evident, prezentând mesaje despre candidat într-un mod care poate influența decizia de vot, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale.
